entries.name: COMPONENT
entries.desc: An Array of the available components for URI::HTTP.

entries.name: DEFAULT_PORT
entries.desc: A Default port of 80 for URI::HTTP.

entries.name: build(args)
entries.desc: Creates a new URI::HTTP object from components, with syntax checking.

entries.name: request_uri()
entries.desc: Returns the full path for an HTTP request, as required by Net::HTTP::Get.
